question: Which disease is gemtuzumab ozogamicin used for?
ideal_answer: Gemtuzumab ozogamicin is used for the treatment of acute myeloid leukemia

snippets.text: Gemtuzumab ozogamicin (GO) is an anti-CD33 antibody-drug conjugate for the treatment of acute myeloid leukemia (AML). Although GO shows a narrow therapeutic window in early clinical studies, recent reports detailing a modified dosing regimen of GO can be safely combined with induction chemotherapy, and the combination provides significant survival benefits in AML patients.
